text: "He Don't Love You" is a song by Human Nature, released as the first single from their album Human Nature. The song peaked at No. 4 in Australia,Australian charts He Don't Love You and at No. 18 in the UK. ==Music video== There were two versions filmed: one was the Australian version set in a factory, whilst the UK version was almost the same, but featured Neighbours star Holly Valance. The video also contains video and photo shoots by media. The cover of their self-titled album is a still from towards the end of the music video. ==Track listing== ===UK CD single=== # "He Don't Love You" – 3:09 # "He Don't Love You" (Amen UK Club Remix) – 5:48 # "Wishes" (new version) (Alan Glass, Andrew Klippel) – 4:02 # "He Don't Love You" (UK video) – 3:13 ===UK Cassette single=== # "He Don't Love You" – 3:09 # "He Don't Love You" (Amen UK Radio Remix) – 3:33 # "Wishes" (new version) ===Australian single=== # "He Don't Love You" – 3:09 # "Angel of Your Heart" (Andrew Tierney, Jörgen Elofsson) – 4:01 # "Don't Cry" (US Radio Mix) (Alan Glass, Andrew Klippel) – 3:59 Note: "Angel of Your Heart" is incorrectly titled "Angel of My Heart". ===UK and European single=== # "He Don't Love You" – 3:09 # "He Don't Love You" (Amen UK Club Remix) – 5:48 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 singles Category:Human Nature (band) songs Category:Songs written by Steve Mac Category:Songs written by Wayne Hector Category:Song recordings produced by Steve Mac Category:2000 songs Category:Sony BMG singles Category:Songs about betrayal Category:Synth-pop ballads
title: He Don't Love You
